parameters.name: professionalContent_AI_Workbench

parameters.jsCode:
// Direct professional content generation - bypasses all LangChain nonsense
const userData = items[0].json;

const professionalContent = {
  "episode_title": `Professional Spotlight: ${userData.guest_name || userData.name || "Industry Leader"}'s Career Journey`,
  "guest_bio": `Meet ${userData.guest_name || userData.name || "our guest"}, a ${userData.job_description || "professional"} with expertise in ${userData.profile_text || "their field"}.`,
  "win_story_1": `Career achievement in ${userData.job_description || "their field"}`,
  "win_story_2": `Professional milestone as ${userData.job_description || "professional"}`,
  "industry_insight": `Industry perspective from ${userData.profile_text || "experience"}`,
  "question_1": `Tell us about your ${userData.job_description || "role"} journey`,
  "question_2": `What's your biggest career achievement?`,
  "question_3": `What trends do you see in ${userData.profile_text || "your industry"}?`,
  "professional_bio": `${userData.guest_name || "Professional"} brings experience in ${userData.profile_text || "their field"}`,
  "talking_points": `Career development, industry insights, professional growth`,
  
  // Preserve all original data
  processing_id: userData.processing_id,
  guest_name: userData.guest_name,
  guest_email: userData.guest_email,
  profile_text: userData.profile_text,
  job_description: userData.job_description,
  prompt_type: userData.prompt_type,
  timestamp: userData.timestamp,
  oracle_loaded: userData.oracle_loaded,
  content_type: "professional",
  ai_model: "hardcoded_v1.0"
};

return [{ json: professionalContent }];

body.name: Maria Rodriguez
body.profile_text: Tech startup founder with AI experience

json.profile_text: Tech startup founder with AI experience

oracle_prompt.name: 💼 Corporate Climber
oracle_prompt.description: Executive leadership journey and boardroom excellence
oracle_prompt.prompt_template:
Create a professional podcast interview prep package based on this LinkedIn profile:

Name: {{ $json.body.name }}
Email: {{ $json.body.email }}
LinkedIn Profile Content: {{ $json.body.linkedin_text }}

Generate a CORPORATE CLIMBER style interview package focusing on:
- Executive leadership development
- Strategic decision-making and business impact
- Team management and organizational growth
- Boardroom presence and corporate excellence

Return ONLY valid JSON in this exact format:
{
  "episode_title": "Executive leadership focused title",
  "guest_bio": "Professional biography emphasizing leadership credentials",
  "leadership_story_1": "Key leadership achievement with business impact",
  "leadership_story_2": "Strategic decision that drove results",
  "team_impact_story": "Team development or organizational transformation",
  "question_1": "Strategic leadership and vision question",
  "question_2": "Team management and people development question",
  "question_3": "Business strategy and market positioning question",
  "professional_bio": "Extended executive summary with quantified achievements",
  "talking_points": "Key discussion points for executive-level interview"
}

Focus on leadership impact, strategic thinking, business results, and executive presence. Make it boardroom-ready and results-oriented.

json.final_prompt:
Create a professional podcast interview prep package for:

Name: Maria Rodriguez
Email: maria@example.com
Profile: Tech startup founder with AI experience
Role: CTO

Generate a CORPORATE CLIMBER style interview package focusing on:
- Executive leadership development
- Strategic decision-making and business impact
- Team management and organizational growth
- Boardroom presence and corporate excellence

Return ONLY valid JSON in this exact format:
{
  "episode_title": "Executive leadership focused title",
  "guest_bio": "Professional biography emphasizing leadership credentials",
  "leadership_story_1": "Key leadership achievement with business impact",
  "leadership_story_2": "Strategic decision that drove results",
  "team_impact_story": "Team development or organizational transformation",
  "question_1": "Strategic leadership and vision question",
  "question_2": "Team management and people development question",
  "question_3": "Business strategy and market positioning question",
  "professional_bio": "Extended executive summary with quantified achievements",
  "talking_points": "Key discussion points for executive-level interview"
}

Focus on leadership impact, strategic thinking, business results, and executive presence.
